alert.note: Alert for Western Magic Valley (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued October 25 at 2:31PM MDT until October 26 at 10:00AM MDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TO 10 AM MDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 30 expected. * WHERE...Western Magic Valley. * WHEN...From 4 AM to 10 AM MDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
